snippet: Afghan officials say two private security contractors were stopped with 30 unlicensed assault rifles in their vehicle, adding to tensions over the continued presence of contractors.
abstract: Afghan officials say two British citizens detained In Kabul with 30 unlicensed assault rifles in their vehicle are private security contractors, igniting already smoldering tensions over the continued presence of such contractors.

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY and SHARIFULLAH SAHAK

lead_paragraph: Afghan officials say two private security contractors were stopped with 30 unlicensed assault rifles in their vehicle, adding to tensions over the continued presence of contractors.

headline.seo: Two British Contractors Held in Kabul on Arms Charges
headline.main: 2 British Contractors Are Held On Weapons Charges in Kabul
headline.print_headline: 2 British Contractors Are Held On Weapons Charges in Kabul
